title: "LogRhythm acquires threat detection startup MistNet"
excerpt: "Security intelligence firm LogRhythm Inc. announced today it has acquired threat detection startup MistNet.IO Inc. for an undisclosed price. Founded in 2016, MistNet offers a security threat detection and prevention platform that is designed to minimize exposure to cybersecurity risks."
